dcterms:creator: Matthias Mueller
Neil Smith
Bernard Ghanem
dcterms:description: A large-scale aerial tracking benchmark involving 123 challenging sequences with more than 112K frames. Performance evaluation on UAV123 can verify the tracking performance in most commonly aerial tracking conditions.
dcterms:title: UAV123

dcterms:creator: Changhong Fu
Ziang Cao
Yiming Li
Junjie Ye
Chen Feng
dcterms:description: A long-term aerial tracking benchmark including over 60k frames, designed to evaluate the effectiveness of tracking methods in long-term scenarios.
dcterms:title: UAVTrack112 L

dcterms:creator: Matthias Mueller
Neil Smith
Bernard Ghanem
dcterms:description: A variant of the UAV123 dataset with an image rate of 10 FPS, which raises the difficulty of tracking due to more abrupt and severe motion and variation.
dcterms:title: UAV123@10fps

dcterms:creator: Siyi Li
Dit-Yan Yeung
dcterms:description: A benchmark that includes 70 severe motion scenarios in various challenging scenes, aimed at evaluating the robustness of tracking methods.
dcterms:title: DTB70
